org.orgName: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the Application of Francis Stephen Medcraf for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.} No. 3038 Praecipe

In the Clerk of the above Entitled Court: You will please prepare and certify and forward copies of record for return to Supreme Court of U.S. in above cases, Petition for Writ. Order Writ, Writ Return to Writ, Motion to Quash, decision, Judgement & order denying petition. Petr's Exceptions, Petition for Appeal, Assignments of Order Alluring appeal Bond in appeal Bond. Citation, Copy of all Minutes of court.
NOTICE- Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings. Rule 11.
